title: localStorage persistence
description: All board state (columns, cards, ordering) persists across page reloads using localStorage. Load saved state on startup, save on every mutation (add/edit/delete/move/reorder).

title: Kanban Board App
description: Single-board kanban app with three default columns (Todo, In Progress, Done), draggable cards with title/description, column reordering, and localStorage persistence. See SPEC.md for full requirements.

title: Project scaffolding and tech stack setup
description: Initialize the project with a suitable tech stack (framework, build tool, dependencies). Set up the dev server, entry point, and base HTML structure. The spec leaves tech stack open — evaluate and choose what fits for a simple SPA with drag-and-drop needs.

Kanban Board

, remove demo SVGs, set title) 5. Verify dev server + build (npm run dev, npm run build) Dependency: #1 first, then #2/#3/#4 parallel, then #5 last. Out of scope: Board/Column/Card components, DnD, localStorage, data models.

title: Board layout with default columns
description: Implement the single board view that displays on load. Render three default columns: Todo, In Progress, Done. Columns should be visually distinct containers arranged horizontally.

title: Drag-and-drop for cards and columns
description: Cards are draggable between columns and reorderable within a column. Columns are reorderable via drag-and-drop. Visual feedback during drag operations (placeholder, hover states).

title: Card CRUD operations
description: Implement card creation (title required, description optional), editing (inline or modal), and deletion. Cards display within their parent column and maintain order.
